channel.title: Read Rust - Getting Started
channel.description: Getting Started posts on Read Rust

item.title: Practical Rust: Installation & Hello World
item.description: Recently, a new language called Rust has come into the spotlight, aiming to be a ‘blazingly fast’ language meant for systems programming…
item.dc:creator: Morgan A. Gallant

item.title: Rust Lifetimes for the Uninitialised
item.description: Lifetimes are a interesting subject: a lot of people seem to gain a day-to-day familiarity with them, without fully understanding what they are. Maybe, they are truly Rust's Monads. Let's talk about what they are, where you encounter them and then how to get competent with them.
item.dc:creator: Florian Gilcher

item.title: Beginner Bites: A taste of Rust, a safe, concurrent and practical language!
item.description: Experience a sampler of Rust. You’ll get set up, then solve the first Project Euler problem in Rust. This is a language you can’t miss.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Jakubowicz
